statements: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patient_records;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patient_records ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_history FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE treatment_history LIKE '%Surgery%';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patient_records ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, diagnosis FROM patient_records GROUP BY diagnosis HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT full_name, diagnosis, date_created FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT full_name, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, full_name FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT p.full_name, m.diagnosis FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT p.full_name, count(m.record_id) AS record_count FROM patients p LEFT JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id GROUP BY p.full_name ORDER BY record_count DESC;
SELECT p.full_name, m.date_created FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.date_created BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY m.date_created ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_personal_information;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patient_personal_information ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth, gender FROM patient_personal_information WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT diagnosis_id, diagnosis_date, diagnosis_description FROM diagnosis_history ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_date, treatment_description FROM treatment_history;
SELECT * FROM patient_personal_information;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM patient_personal_information;
SELECT diagnosis_id, diagnosis_date, diagnosis_description FROM diagnosis_history ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;

SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, diagnosis_date, treatment_description FROM patient_personal_information JOIN diagnosis_history ON patient_personal_information.patient_id = diagnosis_history.patient_id JOIN treatment_history ON diagnosis_history.diagnosis_id = treatment_history.diagnosis_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_personal_information WHERE gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, years_of_experience FROM doctors ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;

SELECT doctors.doctor_name AS 'Doctor Name', doctors.specialization AS 'Specialization', appointments.appointment_date AS 'Appointment Date' FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_id, address FROM patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis_text FROM diagnoses ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE medicine_name LIKE '%paracetamol%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, dob, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F';

SELECT p.name, d.diagnosis_date, t.treatment_date, pr.medicine_name FROM patients p JOIN diagnoses d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE d.diagnosis_text LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT p.name, mh.event_description FROM patients p JOIN medical_history mh ON p.patient_id = mh.patient_id WHERE mh.event_type = 'surgery' ORDER BY mh.history_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT p.name, d.diagnosis_text FROM patients p JOIN diagnoses d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id WHERE d.diagnosis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY p.name DESC;
